Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the amount of tax breaks going to the wealthiest by stating it as "$600 billion worth."
Lack enough support: The claim may lack enough support to fully substantiate the $600 billion figure.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that all tax breaks under "Trumpcare" will go to the wealthiest, which may be a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the tax breaks under "Trumpcare" that are not mentioned in the claim.
